title: cryptopher1
author: cryptopher1
created_time: November 22, 2022, 05:26:05 PMLast edit: May 27, 2023, 12:11:03 PM by cryptopher1
content: I am a copywriter and marketer. Despite the recent crypto crash and uncertainty especially with CEX/CEFI if you are building something beautiful, I would love to extend the following at an affordable rate.Below are the services I offer:- ICO / STO Whitepaper and Litepaper Writing- Investor Presentations (Pitch Decks)- Blockchain and Cryptocurrency Research and Articles- Press Release Writing and Distribution- Whitepaper Analysis, Review and Editing- Website Content- Drafting Legal Documents.- Newsletters- Ann threads creation- Marketing plans including drafting of campaigns, strategy and execution.***Some of my past and recent projects include:1.https://www.memusic.io/documents/deck_v2.1.2.pdf2.https://www.theunfettered.io/the-unfettered-whitepaper.pdf3. https://aurus.io/aurus-whitepaper.pdf4.https://watchskins.com/images/media/WatchSkins_Whitepaper_3.4.2.pdf5.https://gokumarket.com/assets/whitepaper/GokuMarket%20Whitepaper.pdf6.https://www.farm2kitchen.io/downloads/f2kwhitepaper.pdfEvidence of having worked with the above projects is available. ***Among others, I can't disclose due to NDA commitment to my clients.**Definitely, my experience over the years and the last 5 years spent in the crypto and blockchain space will be beneficial to your STO or ICO project. Projects I've participated in raised tens of millions in investor capital.Let's work together add on Telegram @ICO_Services or email contact@coinweez.com

comments.author: cryptopher1
comments.body: ICO STO IDO IEO NFT Web3 Metaverse Blockchain Whitepaper writer available

comments.author: bitxoe
comments.body: You can add your whitepaper writing services on Doer.MarketThe team is planning to launch it next week. It's going to be Fiverr for Crypto services. Add your service in this section: https://doer.market/categories/writing-translation/content-writingGood luck.

comments.body: Contact me for ICO STO IDO IEO NFT Web3 Metaverse and Blockchain Whitepapers or press releases. Affordable rates and samples of my past projects available upon request
